Author: Panic-atthepanic
Text: This is so sweet to read. I'm very happy for you!  It's amazing when you escape the clouded mindset right?  For me, my anorexia is part of my anxiety.  It's half wanting to be small, and half control issues bundled into panicked thoughts of 'WHAT IF'.  Ironically, I came off my antidepressants (anxiety was giving me depression it was so bad) and the ED slowly came back, but... I'm being stubborn because I enjoy feeling a lot more when I'm not medicated.

Author: tea-addicted-taemint
Text: Excellent post <3 my eating disorder is hand in hand with my primary diagnosis of depression - going on antidepressants (Escitalopram for me) gave me the energy to actually work harder and try in recovery
